foreignData.name: Feuerspucker-Lagac
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, fügt der Feuerspucker-Lagac jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.name: Lagac escupefuego
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el Lagac escupefuego hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.

foreignData.name: Lagac crachefeu
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Lagac crachefeu inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.

foreignData.name: Lagac Sputafuoco
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, il Lagac Sputafuoco infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.

foreignData.name: 火吐きラガーク
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、火吐きラガークは各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — トカゲ

foreignData.name: 불을 뿜는 라각
foreignData.text: 대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 불을 뿜는 라각은 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.name: Lagac Cospe-fogo
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Lagac Cospe-fogo causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.

foreignData.name: Плюющийся Огнем Лагак
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Плюющийся Огнем Лагак наносит 1 повреждение каждому оппоненту.

foreignData.name: 喷火勒嘎
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，喷火勒嘎向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

foreignData.name: 噴火勒嘎
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，噴火勒嘎向每位對手各造成1點傷害。

name: Spitfire Lagac
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Spitfire Lagac deals 1 damage to each opponent.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Spitfire Lagac’s ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life.

A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.
A landfall ability doesn’t trigger if a permanent already on the battlefield becomes a land.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Spitfire Lagac deals 1 damage to each opponent.
